line_1: But trotting Butler beats him hollow,
line_2: He leads a way that none can follow;

line_1: But ev'ry tail thou pay't them hollow,
line_2: When thou was corn't, an' I was mellow,

line_1: But ev'ry tail thou pay't them hollow,
line_2: We took the road ay like a Swallow:

line_1: But ev'ry tail thou pay't them hollow,
line_2: At Brooses thou had ne'er a fellow,
